item.title: CoreWeave Falls as Losses Widen on Data Center Investments
item.description: CoreWeave Inc. posted steeper losses as it continued to build to meet demand from artificial intelligence developers and forecast third-quarter operating income that trailed estimates. The company’s s

item.title: CoreWeave Rally Sputters as AI Buildout Costs Widen Losses
item.description: CoreWeave Inc.’s shares fell 10% after it delivered a disappointing earnings outlook, reflecting margin pressures from a rapid AI datacenter expansion.

item.title: CoreWeave Rally Sputters as AI Buildout Costs Widen Losses
item.description: CoreWeave Inc.’s shares fell 10% after it delivered a disappointing earnings outlook, reflecting margin pressures from a rapid AI datacenter expansion.

item.title: CoreWeave Kicks Off $1.5 Billion Bond Sale to Refinance Debt
item.description: CoreWeave Inc., a provider of artificial intelligence computing power, is offering $1.5 billion of senior notes that will be used in part to refinance debt.

item.title: CoreWeave Kicks Off $1.5 Billion Bond Sale to Refinance Debt
item.description: CoreWeave Inc., a provider of artificial intelligence computing power, is offering $1.5 billion of senior notes that will be used in part to refinance debt.
